overview: Resurface is about the experience of physicalisation of the intangible memories and allows them to re-surface as visible marks, be it temporary or permanent. Resurface in order to heal. Through the intense closeness of the visual and distanced memories of the voice, the erotic oscillates.
tagline: Resurface is a work documents the fragmentation of traumatic memories, pain, love marks, bruises, inscription and transforms them to be pleasurable.
title: Resurface
